## v0.0.14 - 2019/08/01
### Added
- `Indexer#index_this_page` method.
### Changed/Removed (Breaking Changes?)
- `Wgit::CONNECTION_DETAILS` now only requires `DB_CONNECTION_STRING` (Yes).
### Fixed
- Found and fixed a bug in `Document#new`.
